title: umm wtf are these?

replies.body:
> did somebody fk up and send the mage rework stuff to the pbe or....

Yep. I did. It wasn't supposed to go to PBE today.

That said, this is what's cooking for Cassiopeia at the moment in the mages update. It won't stay on the PBE for more than probably just this weekend, so if you want to check it out, I guess now's your chance.
Let me guess,Cass can't buy boots because she have no feet?
http://i.imgur.com/5dz1ZPz.jpg

Suddenly, I am totally fine with everything Rep's doing for Cass, JUST for that joke.

And getting rid of that dumb passive, but seriously, making that joke canon is the best.

Yeah nevermind all the other stuff on Boots that isn't move-speed

MUH JOKES xD

You're giving up 15 magic penetration for an entire extra item.

I'd make that trade any day.
In some cases, her passive was OP as goodness. Giving bonus AP, from 5% to 10% to 30%!!! And giving CD reductions and a heal?

Bonus AP means nothing if your ratios are balanced around you having way more AP than the average. Same with CDR. And now the heal is baked in.

So we are losing nothing in exchange for not being able to buy Sorc Boots, which seems fair to me.
{{champion:127}} Syndrome
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/cc3a3dd926ee76ba8e220ed705d7f04e.jpg
RIP Health potion.

No, no, you're mistaken - it's "Healt" potion.
RIP Mana lotion too. Now Kennen can't have any.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gussbojcsxlt2az/League%20of%20Legends%202015-10-24%2021-18-35-01%20-%20kennen%20no%20mana_.jpg?dl=0

And what's even worse are these: {{item:2010}} 

Have you tried purchasing some? You can't!

https://cdn-images-2.medium.com/max/800/1*A2R05lDbzxpAZwW51-wb4w.jpeg
OMG OMG OMG!!! This gives me an idea! Can we have an Omega Rammus with different bodyparts of other champs stuck to his shell? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
You need Jesus

http://img07.deviantart.net/8e29/i/2010/186/b/7/god_is_busy_by_postman0.png

{{champion:17}}
{{champion:267}}: "Wait you wear these things on your feet? Not your head? What even are feet?"
{{champion:56}}: "I don't know,I just put them on my blades."

{{champion:34}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:26}} What about these guys?
Malzahar needs boots. Have you seen his dance moves?

What about Sejuani? As she's riding a poro boarbear, she needs 2 pair of boots. But if she actually does it, she'll just get flamed for it. My precious logic! It went away! Rito, plz! :'(

_I almost managed to write all that with a straight face..._

Is Cass the only mage currently planned to receive this new form of cc? I think it's really cool and suits a poisonish mage like her!

edit: also, does "grounded" mean no movespeed buffs, too? Or just dashes and blinks?
Just dashes and blinks. Includes spellcasts, but also things like Kalista passive, Magical Journeys, and Thresh Lanterns.
So what happens when Kalista attack-moves while debuffed? Does she just walk instead?
Yes.
https://media.giphy.com/media/l41m3r7iP00gJmxKU/giphy.gif
It includes Flash?
It does.

Does it include forms of forced movement? Pulls, knock ups, knock backs, etc.?

I get the impression from "grounded" that it means "stuck to the ground."
It does not.
Are these just tool tip changes, or do they actually work?
I haven't checked personally, but I expect they're actually in the game.

Speaking of tooltips, have Kennen received his mana regen yet?
_Or was that "her"? The genderbender conspiracies intensifies..._

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gussbojcsxlt2az/League%20of%20Legends%202015-10-24%2021-18-35-01%20-%20kennen%20no%20mana_.jpg?dl=0

Why does everyone think Kennen is a she?

-Lore/story states he is a he
-If it's a she, she is really flat chested
-His voice doesn't sound feminine, for a yordle at least
-Surgeon skin portrays him in a stereotypical male-surgeon outfit
-he's a guy

why can't she buy boots? that bars her from being able to get enchantments, too.

does her MS/level justify this?

> does her MS/level justify this?

It's intended to, yes.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ddEZ7Pug,comment-id=000500080001,timestamp=2016-03-26T02:31:47.306+0000)
>
> It's intended to, yes.

What does this add to the champion? It seems like a net neutral to me except in rare, very long games where champions would sell their boots for a different 6th item and Cassiopeia will still get to walk faster.
You also skip boots entirely in your build path, letting you buy more powerful items sooner

Well, it does give her access to other items earlier, both in the gold she saves from not buying boots, and from making it easier to buy more component items. Also "extra" item slot for most of the game (for a pink ward, perhaps). I don't think it's a hugely impactful passive, but it's pretty nice

i really like what u did on passive and w 
and small question does the target need to be poisoned for e or not? like u do e but deal no damage unless the arget is poisoned?
The intended effect for E is targeted light damage, but increased to moderate damage if the target is poisoned.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ddEZ7Pug,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-25T21:45:45.712+0000)
>
> Yep. I did. It wasn't supposed to go to PBE today.
> 
> That said, this is what's cooking for Cassiopeia at the moment in the mages update. It won't stay on the PBE for more than probably just this weekend, so if you want to check it out, I guess now's your chance.

Obviously not necessarily something you can answer but any idea if you're quite set on the removal of the Twin Fang reset? Not necessarily a bad change but it's a big one.
The reset on the spell is gone, but the cooldown is 1 second or less baseline.
1 second CD for a point and click spell?
Its damage is quite tame if the target is not poisoned.
When is the ETA on the mage update on PBE?
Mage Update should still be sometime around "Mid-Season"

Cass main here! o/ I am gonna copy paste one comment that I put in another thread. Hope it get some feedback! "I am a little bit dissapointed with the passive I must say.... I wonder if it would make her feel swift though... I was expecting a more interactive passive, this one sounds just plain basic and overall meh... :/ also miasma is pretty much the same, but the new cc is nice I suppose, It would be nice that it would spread faster and a little bit bigger, also, would it stop dashes aswell? like for example, lee sin throws the Q at you, but you throw the miasma on the way, so when he dashes to you, he would get stuck in the miasma, that would be greaaaattt (this of course would not count to unstoppable abilities like malph's R"

Cassiopeia has a lot of good tactical moment to moment gameplay already with plenty of inputs. A passive that required her to change the way she played in combat runs the risk of feeling really unnatural to the champion. The gameplay behind this passive really comes down to how a player interacts with the item shop, and she will have different interactions than any other champion in this regard. Effectively, she gets to dump ~1000g into combat effective power.

As for Miasma, the spell you see on the PBE is NOT the spell that is being shipped with the update. It will have the Grounded debuff, but it will NOT target the same as the current Miasma.
I know is early and probably is not the final tooltip, but should change her W "grounded" to "crippled", since it might sound like they can't get knocked up/back.

We considered "crippled" but thought maybe the expectation there would be that they are also always slowed (which happens to be the case for this spell, but won't necessarily be the case for all like it in the future).
